sentence.Network_en: As the deadline approached she experienced a bewildering array of emotions.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着最后期限的临近，她开始心绪纷乱，不知所措。

sentence.Network_en: A glance along his bookshelves reveals a bewildering array of interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 看一眼他的书架就知道他兴趣繁杂。

sentence.Network_en: The choice of excursions was bewildering.
sentence.Network_cn: 各种各样可供选择的远足项目让人眼花缭乱。

list.abs: I have just cleared up a bewildering welter of data saved in my computer .我刚整理了保存在我电脑里的很难处理的杂乱无章的数据。
Born and bred a countryman , he was bewildered by London ., 因为他是土生土长的乡下人 , 到伦敦来就晕头转向了.
bestiality 兽奸bewildered state 迷惘状态Bielschowsky disease 幼儿型家族性黑蒙性白痴.
Being in a bewildered state ; dazed., 惊讶的处于困惑状态的 ; 眩晕的.
Benny a bewildered expression on his face ., 本尼东张西望 , 脸上尽是迷茫的表情.

entry.tran: 令人困惑的；令人不知所措的；让人晕头转向的
entry.def: A bewildering thing or situation is very confusing and difficult to understand or to make a decision about.

example.ex: A glance along his bookshelves reveals a bewildering array of interests...
example.tran: 看一眼他的书架就知道他兴趣繁杂。

example.ex: The choice of excursions was bewildering.
example.tran: 各种各样可供选择的远足项目让人眼花缭乱。

sentences.sentence: "the play was at the same time a bewildering and an exciting experience"

means.word_mean: (情况)让人困惑的, 令人费解的

sentences.en: I found the experience quite bewildering.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这次经历令人相当困惑。

sentences.en: The brilliant career of the great French footballer Eric Cantona,and the unruly nature of his character,together present a bewildering picture.
sentences.cn: 出色的法国足球运动员埃里克·坎通纳的辉煌足球生涯和他那桀骜不驯的性格一起构成了一幅令人迷惑的画面。
